ayah: يسٓ
ayah_translit: ya-seen
ayah_english: Ya Sin

ayah: وَٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ ٱلۡحَكِيمِ
ayah_translit: wal-qur'ani al-hakimi
ayah_english: By the Quran the Wise

ayah: وَٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ ٱلۡحَكِيمِ

ayah: إِنَّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ

ayah_english: Indeed you (are) among the Messengers

ayah_translit: tanzila al-'azizi al-rahimi

ayah: لِتُنذِرَ قَوۡمٗا مَّآ أُنذِرَ ءَابَآؤُهُمۡ فَهُمۡ غَٰفِلُونَ
ayah_translit: litundhira qawman ma undhira abauhum fahum ghafiluna
ayah_english: That you may warn a people not were warned their forefathers so they (are) heedless

ayah: لَقَدۡ حَقَّ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ عَلَىٰٓ أَكۡثَرِهِمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
ayah_translit: laqad haqqa al-qawlu ala aktharihim fahum la yu'minuna
ayah_english: Certainly (has) proved true the word upon most of them so they (do) not believe

ayah: إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَا فِيٓ أَعۡنَٰقِهِمۡ أَغۡلَٰلٗا فَهِيَ إِلَى ٱلۡأَذۡقَانِ فَهُم مُّقۡمَحُونَ
ayah_translit: inna ja'alna fi a'naqihim aghlalan fahiya ila al-adhqani fahum muq'mahuna
ayah_english: Indeed [We] have placed on their necks iron collars and they (are up) to the chins so they (are with) heads aloft

ayah: إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَا فِيٓ أَعۡنَٰقِهِمۡ أَغۡلَٰلٗا فَهِيَ إِلَى ٱلۡأَذۡقَانِ فَهُم مُّقۡمَحُونَ

ayah: وَجَعَلۡنَا مِنۢ بَيۡنِ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ سَدّٗا وَمِنۡ خَلۡفِهِمۡ سَدّٗا فَأَغۡشَيۡنَٰهُمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يُبۡصِرُونَ
ayah_translit: waja'alna min bayni aydihim saddan wamin khalfihim saddan fa-aghshaynahum fahum la yub'siruna
ayah_english: And We have made before them before them before them a barrier and behind them and behind them a barrier and We covered them so they (do) not see

ayah: وَجَعَلۡنَا مِنۢ بَيۡنِ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ سَدّٗا وَمِنۡ خَلۡفِهِمۡ سَدّٗا فَأَغۡشَيۡنَٰهُمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يُبۡصِرُونَ

ayah: وَسَوَآءٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَأَنذَرۡتَهُمۡ أَمۡ لَمۡ تُنذِرۡهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
ayah_translit: wasawaon alayhim a-andhartahum am lam tundhir'hum la yu'minuna
ayah_english: And it (is) same to them whether you warn them or (do) not warn them not they will believe

ayah_translit: wasawaon alayhim a-andhartahum am lam tundhir'hum la yu'minuna
ayah_english: And it (is) same to them whether you warn them or (do) not warn them not they will believe

ayah: إِنَّمَا تُنذِرُ مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلذِّكۡرَ وَخَشِيَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِۖ فَبَشِّرۡهُ بِمَغۡفِرَةٖ وَأَجۡرٖ كَرِيمٍ
ayah_translit: innama tundhiru mani ittaba'a al-dhik'ra wakhashiya al-rahmana bil-ghaybi fabashir'hu bimaghfiratin wa-ajrin karimin
ayah_english: Only you (can) warn (him) who follows the Reminder and fears the Most Gracious in the unseen So give him glad tidings of forgiveness and a reward noble

ayah: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نُحۡيِ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَنَكۡتُبُ مَا قَدَّمُواْ وَءَاثَٰرَهُمۡۚ وَكُلَّ شَيۡءٍ أَحۡصَيۡنَٰهُ فِيٓ إِمَامٖ مُّبِينٖ
ayah_translit: inna nahnu nuh'yi al-mawta wanaktubu ma qaddamu waatharahum wakulla shayin ahsaynahu fi imamin mubinin
ayah_english: Indeed We give life (to) the dead and We record what they have sent before and their footprints and every thing We have enumerated it in a Register clear

ayah: وَٱضۡرِبۡ لَهُم مَّثَلًا أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةِ إِذۡ جَآءَهَا ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-id'rib lahum mathalan ashaba al-qaryati idh jaaha al-mur'saluna
ayah_english: And set forth to them an example (of the) companions (of) the city when came to it the Messengers

ayah: وَٱضۡرِبۡ لَهُم مَّثَلًا أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةِ إِذۡ جَآءَهَا ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-id'rib lahum mathalan ashaba al-qaryati idh jaaha al-mur'saluna
ayah_english: And set forth to them an example (of the) companions (of) the city when came to it the Messengers

ayah: وَٱضۡرِبۡ لَهُم مَّثَلًا أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةِ إِذۡ جَآءَهَا ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-id'rib lahum mathalan ashaba al-qaryati idh jaaha al-mur'saluna
ayah_english: And set forth to them an example (of the) companions (of) the city when came to it the Messengers

ayah: إِذۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡهِمُ ٱثۡنَيۡنِ فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَعَزَّزۡنَا بِثَالِثٖ فَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّآ إِلَيۡكُم مُّرۡسَلُونَ
ayah_translit: idh arsalna ilayhimu ith'nayni fakadhabuhuma fa'azzazna bithalithin faqalu inna ilaykum mur'saluna
ayah_english: When We sent to them two (Messengers) but they denied both of them so We strengthened them with a third and they said Indeed We to you (are) Messengers

ayah: قَالُواْ مَآ أَنتُمۡ إِلَّا بَشَرٞ مِّثۡلُنَا وَمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ مِن شَيۡءٍ إِنۡ أَنتُمۡ إِلَّا تَكۡذِبُونَ
ayah_translit: qalu ma antum illa basharun mith'luna wama anzala al-rahmanu min shayin in antum illa takdhibuna
ayah_english: They said Not you (are) but human beings like us and not has revealed the Most Gracious any thing Not you (are) but lying

ayah: وَمَا عَلَيۡنَآ إِلَّا ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ
ayah_translit: wama alayna illa al-balaghu al-mubinu

ayah_translit: wama alayna illa al-balaghu al-mubinu

ayah: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا تَطَيَّرۡنَا بِكُمۡۖ لَئِن لَّمۡ تَنتَهُواْ لَنَرۡجُمَنَّكُمۡ وَلَيَمَسَّنَّكُم مِّنَّا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ
ayah_translit: qalu inna tatayyarna bikum la-in lam tantahu lanarjumannakum walayamassannakum minna adhabun alimun
ayah_english: They said Indeed [we] see an evil omen from you If not you desist surely we will stone you and surely will touch you from us a punishment painful

ayah: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا تَطَيَّرۡنَا بِكُمۡۖ لَئِن لَّمۡ تَنتَهُواْ لَنَرۡجُمَنَّكُمۡ وَلَيَمَسَّنَّكُم مِّنَّا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ

ayah: قَالُواْ طَـٰٓئِرُكُم مَّعَكُمۡ أَئِن ذُكِّرۡتُمۚ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ قَوۡمٞ مُّسۡرِفُونَ
ayah_translit: qalu tairukum ma'akum a-in dhukkir'tum bal antum qawmun mus'rifuna
ayah_english: They said Your evil omen (be) with you! Is it because you are admonished Nay you (are) a people transgressing

ayah: وَجَآءَ مِنۡ أَقۡصَا ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ رَجُلٞ يَسۡعَىٰ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱتَّبِعُواْ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ
ayah_translit: wajaa min aqsa al-madinati rajulun yas'a qala yaqawmi ittabi'u al-mur'salina
ayah_english: And came from (the) farthest end (of) the city a man running He said O my People! Follow the Messengers

ayah: ٱتَّبِعُواْ مَن لَّا يَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ أَجۡرٗا وَهُم مُّهۡتَدُونَ
ayah_translit: ittabi'u man la yasalukum ajran wahum muh'taduna
ayah_english: Follow (those) who (do) not ask (of) you any payment and they (are) rightly guided

ayah: وَمَا لِيَ لَآ أَعۡبُدُ ٱلَّذِي فَطَرَنِي وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ
ayah_translit: wama liya la a'budu alladhi fatarani wa-ilayhi tur'ja'una
ayah_english: And what (is) for me (that) not I worship the One Who created me and to Whom you will be returned

ayah: ءَأَتَّخِذُ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ ءَالِهَةً إِن يُرِدۡنِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ بِضُرّٖ لَّا تُغۡنِ عَنِّي شَفَٰعَتُهُمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا يُنقِذُونِ
ayah_translit: a-attakhidhu min dunihi alihatan in yurid'ni al-rahmanu bidurrin la tugh'ni anni shafa'atuhum shayan wala yunqidhuni
ayah_english: Should I take besides Him besides Him gods If intends for me the Most Gracious any harm not will avail [from] me their intercession (in) anything and not they (can) save me

ayah_english: Indeed I then surely would be in an error clear

ayah: إِنِّيٓ ءَامَنتُ بِرَبِّكُمۡ فَٱسۡمَعُونِ
ayah_translit: inni amantu birabbikum fa-is'ma'uni
ayah_english: Indeed I have believed in your Lord so listen to me

ayah: قِيلَ ٱدۡخُلِ ٱلۡجَنَّةَۖ قَالَ يَٰلَيۡتَ قَوۡمِي يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: qila ud'khuli al-janata qala yalayta qawmi ya'lamuna
ayah_english: It was said Enter Paradise He said O would that! My people knew

ayah: ۞وَمَآ أَنزَلۡنَا عَلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ مِن جُندٖ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا كُنَّا مُنزِلِينَ
ayah_translit: wama anzalna ala qawmihi min ba'dihi min jundin mina al-samai wama kunna munzilina
ayah_english: And not We sent down upon his people after him after him any host from the heaven and not were We (to) send down

ayah_translit: wama anzalna ala qawmihi min ba'dihi min jundin mina al-samai wama kunna munzilina

ayah: إِن كَانَتۡ إِلَّا صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَإِذَا هُمۡ خَٰمِدُونَ
ayah_translit: in kanat illa sayhatan wahidatan fa-idha hum khamiduna
ayah_english: Not it was but a shout one then behold! They (were) extinguished

ayah: يَٰحَسۡرَةً عَلَى ٱلۡعِبَادِۚ مَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ
ayah_translit: yahasratan ala al-'ibadi ma yatihim min rasulin illa kanu bihi yastahziuna
ayah_english: Alas for the servants Not came to them any Messenger but they did mock at him mock at him

ayah: أَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ كَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡقُرُونِ أَنَّهُمۡ إِلَيۡهِمۡ لَا يَرۡجِعُونَ
ayah_translit: alam yaraw kam ahlakna qablahum mina al-quruni annahum ilayhim la yarji'una
ayah_english: Do not they see how many We destroyed before them of the generations That they to them will not return will not return

ayah: وَإِن كُلّٞ لَّمَّا جَمِيعٞ لَّدَيۡنَا مُحۡضَرُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-in kullun lamma jami'un ladayna muh'daruna
ayah_english: And surely all then together before Us (will be) brought

ayah: وَءَايَةٞ لَّهُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ ٱلۡمَيۡتَةُ أَحۡيَيۡنَٰهَا وَأَخۡرَجۡنَا مِنۡهَا حَبّٗا فَمِنۡهُ يَأۡكُلُونَ
ayah_translit: waayatun lahumu al-ardu al-maytatu ahyaynaha wa-akhrajna min'ha habban famin'hu yakuluna
ayah_english: And a Sign for them (is) the earth dead We give it life and We bring forth from it grain and from it they eat

ayah: وَجَعَلۡنَا فِيهَا جَنَّـٰتٖ مِّن نَّخِيلٖ وَأَعۡنَٰبٖ وَفَجَّرۡنَا فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلۡعُيُونِ
ayah_translit: waja'alna fiha jannatin min nakhilin wa-a'nabin wafajjarna fiha mina al-'uyuni
ayah_english: And We placed therein gardens of date-palms and grapevines and We caused to gush forth in it of the springs

ayah: لِيَأۡكُلُواْ مِن ثَمَرِهِۦ وَمَا عَمِلَتۡهُ أَيۡدِيهِمۡۚ أَفَلَا يَشۡكُرُونَ
ayah_translit: liyakulu min thamarihi wama amilathu aydihim afala yashkuruna
ayah_english: That they may eat of its fruit And not made it their hands So will not they be grateful

ayah: سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلۡأَزۡوَٰجَ كُلَّهَا مِمَّا تُنۢبِتُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَمِنۡ أَنفُسِهِمۡ وَمِمَّا لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: sub'hana alladhi khalaqa al-azwaja kullaha mimma tunbitu al-ardu wamin anfusihim wamimma la ya'lamuna
ayah_english: Glory be (to) the One Who created (in) pairs all of what grows the earth and of themselves and of what not they know

ayah: وَءَايَةٞ لَّهُمُ ٱلَّيۡلُ نَسۡلَخُ مِنۡهُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فَإِذَا هُم مُّظۡلِمُونَ
ayah_translit: waayatun lahumu al-laylu naslakhu min'hu al-nahara fa-idha hum muz'limuna
ayah_english: And a Sign for them (is) the night We withdraw from it the day Then behold! They (are) those in darkness

ayah_translit: waayatun lahumu al-laylu naslakhu min'hu al-nahara fa-idha hum muz'limuna
ayah_english: And a Sign for them (is) the night We withdraw from it the day Then behold! They (are) those in darkness

ayah: وَٱلشَّمۡسُ تَجۡرِي لِمُسۡتَقَرّٖ لَّهَاۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَقۡدِيرُ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡعَلِيمِ
ayah_translit: wal-shamsu tajri limus'taqarrin laha dhalika taqdiru al-'azizi al-'alimi
ayah_english: And the sun runs to a term appointed for it That (is the) Decree (of) the All-Mighty the All-Knowing

ayah: وَٱلۡقَمَرَ قَدَّرۡنَٰهُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَٱلۡعُرۡجُونِ ٱلۡقَدِيمِ
ayah_translit: wal-qamara qaddarnahu manazila hatta ada kal-'ur'juni al-qadimi
ayah_english: And the moon We have ordained for it phases until it returns like the date stalk the old

ayah: لَا ٱلشَّمۡسُ يَنۢبَغِي لَهَآ أَن تُدۡرِكَ ٱلۡقَمَرَ وَلَا ٱلَّيۡلُ سَابِقُ ٱلنَّهَارِۚ وَكُلّٞ فِي فَلَكٖ يَسۡبَحُونَ
ayah_translit: la al-shamsu yanbaghi laha an tud'rika al-qamara wala al-laylu sabiqu al-nahari wakullun fi falakin yasbahuna
ayah_english: Not the sun is permitted for it that it overtakes the moon and not the night (can) outstrip the day but all in an orbit they are floating

ayah: وَءَايَةٞ لَّهُمۡ أَنَّا حَمَلۡنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ ٱلۡمَشۡحُونِ
ayah_translit: waayatun lahum anna hamalna dhurriyyatahum fi al-ful'ki al-mashhuni
ayah_english: And a Sign for them (is) that We carried their offspring in the ship laden

ayah: وَإِن نَّشَأۡ نُغۡرِقۡهُمۡ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنقَذُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-in nasha nugh'riq'hum fala sarikha lahum wala hum yunqadhuna

ayah: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱتَّقُواْ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيكُمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَكُمۡ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَمُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-idha qila lahumu ittaqu ma bayna aydikum wama khalfakum la'allakum tur'hamuna

ayah: وَمَا تَأۡتِيهِم مِّنۡ ءَايَةٖ مِّنۡ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ إِلَّا كَانُواْ عَنۡهَا مُعۡرِضِينَ
ayah_translit: wama tatihim min ayatin min ayati rabbihim illa kanu anha mu'ridina
ayah_english: And not comes to them of a Sign from (the) Signs (of) their Lord but they from it turn away

ayah: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمۡ أَنفِقُواْ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَنُطۡعِمُ مَن لَّوۡ يَشَآءُ ٱللَّهُ أَطۡعَمَهُۥٓ إِنۡ أَنتُمۡ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ
ayah_translit: wa-idha qila lahum anfiqu mimma razaqakumu al-lahu qala alladhina kafaru lilladhina amanu anut'imu man law yashau al-lahu at'amahu in antum illa fi dalalin mubinin
ayah_english: And when it is said to them Spend from what (has) provided you Allah Said those who disbelieved to those who believed Should we feed whom if Allah willed Allah willed He would have fed him Not (are) you except in an error clear

ayah: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمۡ أَنفِقُواْ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَنُطۡعِمُ مَن لَّوۡ يَشَآءُ ٱللَّهُ أَطۡعَمَهُۥٓ إِنۡ أَنتُمۡ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

ayah: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمۡ أَنفِقُواْ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَنُطۡعِمُ مَن لَّوۡ يَشَآءُ ٱللَّهُ أَطۡعَمَهُۥٓ إِنۡ أَنتُمۡ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

ayah_translit: wayaquluna mata hadha al-wa'du in kuntum sadiqina
ayah_english: And they say When (is) this promise if you are truthful

ayah: مَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ تَأۡخُذُهُمۡ وَهُمۡ يَخِصِّمُونَ
ayah_translit: ma yanzuruna illa sayhatan wahidatan takhudhuhum wahum yakhissimuna
ayah_english: Not they await except a shout one it will seize them while they are disputing

ayah: فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ تَوۡصِيَةٗ وَلَآ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ
ayah_translit: fala yastati'una tawsiyatan wala ila ahlihim yarji'una

ayah: وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَإِذَا هُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ يَنسِلُونَ
ayah_translit: wanufikha fi al-suri fa-idha hum mina al-ajdathi ila rabbihim yansiluna
ayah_english: And will be blown [in] the trumpet and behold! They from the graves to their Lord [they] will hasten

ayah: قَالُواْ يَٰوَيۡلَنَا مَنۢ بَعَثَنَا مِن مَّرۡقَدِنَاۜۗ هَٰذَا مَا وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَصَدَقَ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ
ayah_translit: qalu yawaylana man ba'athana min marqadina hadha ma wa'ada al-rahmanu wasadaqa al-mur'saluna
ayah_english: They [will] say O woe to us! Who has raised us from our sleeping place This (is) what (had) promised the Most Gracious and told (the) truth the Messengers

ayah: إِن كَانَتۡ إِلَّا صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَإِذَا هُمۡ جَمِيعٞ لَّدَيۡنَا مُحۡضَرُونَ
ayah_translit: in kanat illa sayhatan wahidatan fa-idha hum jami'un ladayna muh'daruna
ayah_english: Not it will be but a shout single so behold! They all before Us (will be) brought

ayah: إِن كَانَتۡ إِلَّا صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَإِذَا هُمۡ جَمِيعٞ لَّدَيۡنَا مُحۡضَرُونَ

ayah: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ لَا تُظۡلَمُ نَفۡسٞ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا تُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: fal-yawma la tuz'lamu nafsun shayan wala tuj'zawna illa ma kuntum ta'maluna
ayah_english: So this Day not will be wronged a soul (in) anything and not you will be recompensed except (for) what you used (to) do

ayah: ۞أَلَمۡ أَعۡهَدۡ إِلَيۡكُمۡ يَٰبَنِيٓ ءَادَمَ أَن لَّا تَعۡبُدُواْ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنَۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمۡ عَدُوّٞ مُّبِينٞ
ayah_translit: alam a'had ilaykum yabani adama an la ta'budu al-shaytana innahu lakum aduwwun mubinun
ayah_english: Did not I enjoin upon you O Children of Adam O Children of Adam That (do) not worship the Shaitaan indeed, he (is) for you an enemy clear

ayah_english: Did not I enjoin upon you O Children of Adam O Children of Adam That (do) not worship the Shaitaan indeed, he (is) for you an enemy clear

ayah: وَأَنِ ٱعۡبُدُونِيۚ هَٰذَا صِرَٰطٞ مُّسۡتَقِيمٞ
ayah_translit: wa-ani u'buduni hadha siratun mus'taqimun
ayah_english: And that you worship Me This (is) a Path straight

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمۡ جِبِلّٗا كَثِيرًاۖ أَفَلَمۡ تَكُونُواْ تَعۡقِلُونَ
ayah_translit: walaqad adalla minkum jibillan kathiran afalam takunu ta'qiluna
ayah_english: And indeed he led astray from you a multitude great Then did not you use reason

ayah_translit: hadhihi jahannamu allati kuntum tu'aduna
ayah_english: This (is) (the) Hell which you were promised

ayah_translit: is'lawha al-yawma bima kuntum takfuruna
ayah_english: Burn therein this Day because you used (to) disbelieve

ayah: ٱلۡيَوۡمَ نَخۡتِمُ عَلَىٰٓ أَفۡوَٰهِهِمۡ وَتُكَلِّمُنَآ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَتَشۡهَدُ أَرۡجُلُهُم بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ
ayah_translit: al-yawma nakhtimu ala afwahihim watukallimuna aydihim watashhadu arjuluhum bima kanu yaksibuna
ayah_english: This Day We will seal [on] their mouths and will speak to Us their hands and will bear witness their feet about what they used (to) earn

ayah: وَلَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَطَمَسۡنَا عَلَىٰٓ أَعۡيُنِهِمۡ فَٱسۡتَبَقُواْ ٱلصِّرَٰطَ فَأَنَّىٰ يُبۡصِرُونَ
ayah_translit: walaw nashau latamasna ala a'yunihim fa-is'tabaqu al-sirata fa-anna yub'siruna
ayah_english: And if We willed We (would have) surely obliterated [over] their eyes then they (would) race (to find) the path then how (could) they see

ayah: وَلَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَمَسَخۡنَٰهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِهِمۡ فَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ مُضِيّٗا وَلَا يَرۡجِعُونَ
ayah_translit: walaw nashau lamasakhnahum ala makanatihim fama is'tata'u mudiyyan wala yarji'una
ayah_english: And if We willed surely We (would have) transformed them in their places then not they would have been able to proceed and not return

ayah: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرۡهُ نُنَكِّسۡهُ فِي ٱلۡخَلۡقِۚ أَفَلَا يَعۡقِلُونَ
ayah_translit: waman nu'ammir'hu nunakkis'hu fi al-khalqi afala ya'qiluna
ayah_english: And (he) whom We grant him long life We reverse him in the creation Then will not they use intellect

ayah: وَمَا عَلَّمۡنَٰهُ ٱلشِّعۡرَ وَمَا يَنۢبَغِي لَهُۥٓۚ إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡرٞ وَقُرۡءَانٞ مُّبِينٞ
ayah_translit: wama allamnahu al-shi'ra wama yanbaghi lahu in huwa illa dhik'run waqur'anun mubinun
ayah_english: And not We taught him [the] poetry and not it is befitting for him Not it (is) except a Reminder and a Quran clear

ayah: لِّيُنذِرَ مَن كَانَ حَيّٗا وَيَحِقَّ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
ayah_translit: liyundhira man kana hayyan wayahiqqa al-qawlu ala al-kafirina
ayah_english: To warn (him) who is alive and may be proved true the Word against the disbelievers

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ أَنَّا خَلَقۡنَا لَهُم مِّمَّا عَمِلَتۡ أَيۡدِينَآ أَنۡعَٰمٗا فَهُمۡ لَهَا مَٰلِكُونَ
ayah_translit: awalam yaraw anna khalaqna lahum mimma amilat aydina an'aman fahum laha malikuna
ayah_english: Do not they see that We [We] created for them from what have made Our hands cattle then they [for them] (are the) owners

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَنَّا خَلَقۡنَٰهُ مِن نُّطۡفَةٖ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٞ مُّبِينٞ
ayah_translit: awalam yara al-insanu anna khalaqnahu min nut'fatin fa-idha huwa khasimun mubinun
ayah_english: Does not see [the] man that We [We] created him from a sperm-drop Then behold! He (is) an opponent clear

ayah: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلٗا وَنَسِيَ خَلۡقَهُۥۖ قَالَ مَن يُحۡيِ ٱلۡعِظَٰمَ وَهِيَ رَمِيمٞ
ayah_translit: wadaraba lana mathalan wanasiya khalqahu qala man yuh'yi al-'izama wahiya ramimun
ayah_english: And he sets forth for Us an example and forgets his (own) creation He says Who will give life (to) the bones while they (are) decomposed

ayah: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلٗا وَنَسِيَ خَلۡقَهُۥۖ قَالَ مَن يُحۡيِ ٱلۡعِظَٰمَ وَهِيَ رَمِيمٞ

ayah: قُلۡ يُحۡيِيهَا ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنشَأَهَآ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٖۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ خَلۡقٍ عَلِيمٌ
ayah_translit: qul yuh'yiha alladhi ansha-aha awwala marratin wahuwa bikulli khalqin alimun
ayah_english: Say He will give them life Who produced them (the) first time and He (is) of every creation All-Knower

ayah: قُلۡ يُحۡيِيهَا ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنشَأَهَآ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٖۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ خَلۡقٍ عَلِيمٌ

ayah: ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلشَّجَرِ ٱلۡأَخۡضَرِ نَارٗا فَإِذَآ أَنتُم مِّنۡهُ تُوقِدُونَ
ayah_translit: alladhi ja'ala lakum mina al-shajari al-akhdari naran fa-idha antum min'hu tuqiduna
ayah_english: The One Who made for you from the tree [the] green fire and behold! You from it ignite

ayah: أَوَلَيۡسَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يَخۡلُقَ مِثۡلَهُمۚ بَلَىٰ وَهُوَ ٱلۡخَلَّـٰقُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
ayah_translit: awalaysa alladhi khalaqa al-samawati wal-arda biqadirin ala an yakhluqa mith'lahum bala wahuwa al-khalaqu al-'alimu
ayah_english: Is it not (He) Who created the heavens and the earth Able to [that] create (the) like of them Yes indeed! and He (is) the Supreme Creator the All-Knower

ayah: أَوَلَيۡسَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يَخۡلُقَ مِثۡلَهُمۚ بَلَىٰ وَهُوَ ٱلۡخَلَّـٰقُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

ayah: أَوَلَيۡسَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يَخۡلُقَ مِثۡلَهُمۚ بَلَىٰ وَهُوَ ٱلۡخَلَّـٰقُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

ayah: إِنَّمَآ أَمۡرُهُۥٓ إِذَآ أَرَادَ شَيۡـًٔا أَن يَقُولَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ
ayah_translit: innama amruhu idha arada shayan an yaqula lahu kun fayakunu
ayah_english: Only His Command when He intends a thing that He says to it Be and it is

ayah: فَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱلَّذِي بِيَدِهِۦ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ
ayah_translit: fasub'hana alladhi biyadihi malakutu kulli shayin wa-ilayhi tur'ja'una
ayah_english: So glorified be (He) Who in Whose hand is (the) dominion (of) all things and to Him you will be returned
